metadata.name: Beachverse #2099
metadata.description: Beachverse is a real-estate buying, selling, and trading NFT strategy based-game that is based on a collection of 2,222 NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. Players are given the opportunity to acquire real estate within our ecosystem and will have the ability to stake in order to generate $CONDO tokens — the game’s in-game currency. $CONDO enables the player to earn rewards that will help them expand their property empire and allow them the opportunity to rent out to tenants!
